Components.Label: Hbl
Components.Query:
select *
from [Shipment]
where Id in ({HblIds})

select *
from [ShipmentFee]
where ShipmentId in ({HblIds}) and TypeId in ({TypeIds}) and (1 = {IsObh} or (0 = {IsObh} and ObhId is null)) and NoSubmit = 0

select *
from [EntityContainer]
where EntityId in ({HblIds})

select *
from [EntityContainer]

select *
from [EntityTransit]
where EntityId in ('{Id}')

Components.Label: Bill Of Lading
Components.Query:
WITH Sumcont AS (
    SELECT 
        SUM(ct1.PKG) AS PKG1,
		SUM(ct1.Weight) AS weight1,
		SUM(ct1.CBM) AS cbm1
		 
        
    FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct1
    LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm1 ON ct1.EntityId = sm1.Id
    WHERE sm1.Id = '{Id}'
    GROUP BY sm1.Id
)
SELECT 
ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBLNo,
ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shippertext, 
ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeDes,'') AS consigneetext, 
ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS NotyDes,
ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') AS Feedervessel,
ISNULL(POl.Name,'') AS POLName,
ISNULL(POD.Name,'') AS PODName,
ISNULL(destination.Name,'') AS Destination,
isnull(payableat.Name,'') as Payable,
isnull(sm.NumberOriginalIdText,'') AS numberbill,
ISNULL(sm.ShippingMark,'') AS SPMK,
ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DetailsGoodstext,
ISNULL( sm.ForDeliveryGoodsDes,'') AS Deliverygoods,
ISNULL(charge.Name,'') AS Chageterm,
ISNULL(place.Name,'') AS placeissue,

FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.IssueDate,''),'dd MMM, yy') AS dateissue,
ISNULL(receipt.Name,'') AS placereceipt,
ISNULL(deliveryplace.Name,'') AS deliveryplace ,
ISNULL(typemove.Name,'') AS Typeofmove,
ISNULL(caluse.Name,'') AS clause,
FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.SaillingDate,''),'dd MMM, yyyy') AS saillingdate,
ISNULL(sm.ContainerText,'') AS quantityofcontainer,
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unitpkg,

FORMAT((SELECT PKG1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.PKG1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumpkg,
FORMAT((SELECT weight1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.weight1 IS NOT NULL ),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumweight,
FORMAT((SELECT cbm1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.cbm1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumcbm

FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = sm.PolId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.FinalDestinationId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData payableat ON payableat.Id = sm.FreightPayableId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData charge ON charge.Id = sm.FreightChargeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData place ON place.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON receipt.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal deliveryplace ON deliveryplace.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData typemove ON typemove.Id = sm.TypeMoveId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData caluse ON caluse.Id = sm.ClauseId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=sm.UnitId
WHERE   sm.Id='{Id}' 

SELECT 
ISNULL(contype.Name,'') AS consize,
ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS ContNo,
ISNULL(ct.SealNo,'') AS Seal,
format(ISNULL(ct.PKG,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS Qty,
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unit,
format(ISNULL(ct.Weight,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS GW,
format(ISNULL(ct.CBM,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS CBM

FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON ct.EntityId=sm.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData contype ON ct.ContainerTypeId = contype.Id 
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=ct.UnitId 
WHERE ct.EntityId=sm.Id AND sm.Id='{Id}'

SELECT SUM(ct.PKG) AS pkg3, SUM(ct.Weight) AS weight3 , SUM(ct.CBM) AS cbm3

FROM dbo.EntityContainer  ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment shipt ON ct.EntityId=shipt.Id
WHERE shipt.Id='{Id}'

Components.Label: Bill3
Components.Query:
WITH Sumcont AS (
    SELECT 
        SUM(ct1.PKG) AS PKG1,
		SUM(ct1.Weight) AS weight1,
		SUM(ct1.CBM) AS cbm1
		 
        
    FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct1
    LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm1 ON ct1.EntityId = sm1.Id
    WHERE sm1.Id = '{Id}'
    GROUP BY sm1.Id
)
SELECT 
ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBLNo,
ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shippertext, 
ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeDes,'') AS consigneetext, 
ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS NotyDes,
ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') AS Feedervessel,
ISNULL(POl.Name,'') AS POLName,
ISNULL(POD.Name,'') AS PODName,
ISNULL(destination.Name,'') AS Destination,
isnull(payableat.Name,'') as Payable,
isnull(sm.NumberOriginalIdText,'') AS numberbill,
ISNULL(sm.ShippingMark,'') AS SPMK,
ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DetailsGoodstext,
ISNULL( sm.ForDeliveryGoodsDes,'') AS Deliverygoods,
ISNULL(charge.Name,'') AS Chageterm,
ISNULL(place.Name,'') AS placeissue,

FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.IssueDate,''),'dd MMM, yy') AS dateissue,
ISNULL(receipt.Name,'') AS placereceipt,
ISNULL(deliveryplace.Name,'') AS deliveryplace ,
ISNULL(typemove.Name,'') AS Typeofmove,
ISNULL(caluse.Name,'') AS clause,
FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.SaillingDate,''),'dd MMM, yyyy') AS saillingdate,
ISNULL(sm.ContainerText,'') AS quantityofcontainer,
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unitpkg,

FORMAT((SELECT PKG1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.PKG1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumpkg,
FORMAT((SELECT weight1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.weight1 IS NOT NULL ),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumweight,
FORMAT((SELECT cbm1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.cbm1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumcbm

FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = sm.PolId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.FinalDestinationId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData payableat ON payableat.Id = sm.FreightPayableId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData charge ON charge.Id = sm.FreightChargeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData place ON place.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON receipt.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal deliveryplace ON deliveryplace.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData typemove ON typemove.Id = sm.TypeMoveId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData caluse ON caluse.Id = sm.ClauseId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=sm.UnitId
WHERE   sm.Id='{Id}' 

SELECT 
ISNULL(contype.Name,'') AS consize,
ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS ContNo,
ISNULL(ct.SealNo,'') AS Seal,
format(ISNULL(ct.PKG,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS Qty,
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unit,
format(ISNULL(ct.Weight,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS GW,
format(ISNULL(ct.CBM,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS CBM

FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON ct.EntityId=sm.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData contype ON ct.ContainerTypeId = contype.Id 
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=ct.UnitId 
WHERE ct.EntityId=sm.Id AND sm.Id='{Id}'

SELECT SUM(ct.PKG) AS pkg3, SUM(ct.Weight) AS weight3 , SUM(ct.CBM) AS cbm3

FROM dbo.EntityContainer  ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment shipt ON ct.EntityId=shipt.Id
WHERE shipt.Id='{Id}'

Components.Label: Split Hbl
Components.Query:
select *
from [Shipment]
where Id in ({HblIds})

select *
from [ShipmentFee]
where ShipmentId in ({HblIds}) and TypeId in ({TypeIds}) and (1 = {IsObh} or (0 = {IsObh} and ObhId is null)) and NoSubmit = 0

select *
from [EntityContainer]
where EntityId in ({HblIds})

Components.Label: Manifest
Components.Query:
SELECT 
ISNULL(sm.docsno,'') AS DocsNo,
ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.DocsDate,'yyyy'),'') AS Docsdate,
ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shipperdes,
CASE 
WHEN  ( LEN(sm.ConsigneeDes) - LEN (REPLACE(sm.ConsigneeDes,'#',''))>1 )THEN sm.ConsigneeDes 
WHEN ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeId,'')<>'' AND ( LEN(sm.ConsigneeDes) - LEN (REPLACE(sm.ConsigneeDes,'#',''))<1 )  THEN 
(ISNULL(consignee.TaxCode,'') + '#' + ISNULL(consignee.CompanyName,'') + '#' + ISNULL(consignee.Address,''))
ELSE 
(customes.TaxCode + '#' + REPLACE(sm.ConsigneeDes, CHAR(10),'#'))
END  AS Consignee,
ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS notifyparty1,
ISNULL(sm.NominationParty ,'') AS notifyparty2,
ISNULL(transitport.Code,'')AS transit,
ISNULL(destination.Code,'') AS destination,
ISNULL(pol.Code,'') AS POL,
ISNULL(POD.Code,'') AS POD,
ISNULL(Delivery.Name,'') AS Placeofdelivery,
ISNULL(sm.CargoType,'') AS Cargotype,
ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBL,
ISNULL(placeissue.Name,'') AS PlaceIssue,
ISNULL(format(sm.IssueDate,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'') AS issuedate,
ISNULL(mbl.MblNo,'') AS MBL,
ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtdDate,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'') AS ETD,
ISNULL(sm.Quantity,'') AS Quantity ,
CASE WHEN 
ISNULL(unit.CodeMn,'')='' AND ISNULL(unit.code,'')<>'' THEN ISNULL(unit.Code,'')
ELSE 
ISNULL(unit.CodeMn,'')
END AS Unit,
ISNULL(sm.GW,'') AS GW,
ISNULL(sm.ShippingMark,'') AS SPM,
ISNULL(FORMAT(mbl.mbldate,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'') AS MBLdate
FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal transitport ON transitport.Id = sm.PortTransitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner consignee ON consignee.Id = sm.ConsigneeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner customes ON customes.Id = sm.CustomerId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.FinalDestinationId
left JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal Delivery ON Delivery.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal placeissue ON placeissue.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id = sm.UnitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment mbl ON mbl.Id = sm.ParentId

WHERE sm.Id='{Id}'

SELECT 
ISNULL(sm.HSCode,'') AS HSCODE,
ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DescriptionGoods, 
ISNULL(ct.Weight,'') AS GW,
ISNULL(ct.CBM,'') AS CBM,
ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS ContainerNo,
ISNULL(ct.SealNo,'') AS SealNo

FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON ct.EntityId= sm.id
WHERE sm.Id = '{Id}'

Components.Label: Cargo Manifest CFS
Components.Query:
SELECT 
ISNULL(sm.docsno,'') AS DocsNo,
ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.DocsDate,'yyyy'),'') AS Docsdate,
ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shipperdes,
CASE 
WHEN  ( LEN(sm.ConsigneeDes) - LEN (REPLACE(sm.ConsigneeDes,'#',''))>1 )THEN sm.ConsigneeDes 
WHEN ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeId,'')<>'' AND ( LEN(sm.ConsigneeDes) - LEN (REPLACE(sm.ConsigneeDes,'#',''))<1 )  THEN 
(ISNULL(consignee.TaxCode,'') + '#' + ISNULL(consignee.CompanyName,'') + '#' + ISNULL(consignee.Address,''))
ELSE 
(customes.TaxCode + '#' + REPLACE(sm.ConsigneeDes, CHAR(10),'#'))
END  AS Consignee,
ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS notifyparty1,
ISNULL(sm.NominationParty ,'') AS notifyparty2,
ISNULL(transitport.Code,'')AS transit,
ISNULL(destination.Code,'') AS destination,
ISNULL(pol.Code,'') AS POL,
ISNULL(POD.Code,'') AS POD,
ISNULL(Delivery.Name,'') AS Placeofdelivery,
ISNULL(sm.CargoType,'') AS Cargotype,
ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBL,
ISNULL(placeissue.Name,'') AS PlaceIssue,
ISNULL(format(sm.IssueDate,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'') AS issuedate,
ISNULL(mbl.MblNo,'') AS MBL,
ISNULL(FORMAT(sm.EtdDate,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'') AS ETD,
ISNULL(sm.Quantity,'') AS Quantity ,
CASE WHEN 
ISNULL(unit.CodeMn,'')='' AND ISNULL(unit.code,'')<>'' THEN ISNULL(unit.Code,'')
ELSE 
ISNULL(unit.CodeMn,'')
END AS Unit,
ISNULL(sm.GW,'') AS GW,
ISNULL(sm.ShippingMark,'') AS SPM,
ISNULL(FORMAT(mbl.mbldate,'dd/MM/yyyy'),'') AS MBLdate
FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal transitport ON transitport.Id = sm.PortTransitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner consignee ON consignee.Id = sm.ConsigneeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner customes ON customes.Id = sm.CustomerId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.FinalDestinationId
left JOIN dbo.Terminal pol ON pol.Id = sm.PolId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal Delivery ON Delivery.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal placeissue ON placeissue.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id = sm.UnitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment mbl ON mbl.Id = sm.ParentId

WHERE sm.Id='{Id}'

SELECT 
ISNULL(sm.HSCode,'') AS HSCODE,
ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DescriptionGoods, 
ISNULL(ct.Weight,'') AS GW,
ISNULL(ct.CBM,'') AS CBM,
ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS ContainerNo,
ISNULL(ct.SealNo,'') AS SealNo

FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON ct.EntityId= sm.id
WHERE sm.Id = '{Id}'

Components.Label: PL
Components.Query:
WITH REV AS 
(	SELECT SUM(ISNULL(CASE WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'USD' AND curr.Name<>'USD' THEN ROUND(smf.TotalAmount * smf.ExSaleUSD,2)
	WHEN CurrSale.Code = 'USD' AND curr.Name = 'USD' THEN ROUND(smf.TotalAmount,2) 
	WHEN CurrSale.Code = 'VND' AND curr.Name='VND' THEN smf.TotalAmount
	ELSE smf.TotalAmount*smf.ExchangeRateVND
	END,0)) AS AmountPartnert,
	smf.TypeId AS loaiphi,
	smf.ObhId AS obhid,
	smf.ParentId AS parentid,
	smf.IsAdvCustomer AS advcus,smf.IsAdvProvider AS advpro
	FROM 
	dbo.ShipmentFee smf 
	LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment  sm1 ON sm1.Id=smf.FileId
	LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON smf.CurrencyId=curr.Name
	LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData CurrSale ON CurrSale.Id = '{CurrencyId}'
	LEFT JOIN STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ',')  split_hbl ON smf.ShipmentId = split_hbl.value 
    WHERE smf.FileId=sm1.Id AND sm1.Id='{Id}'
		and smf.ShipmentId = split_hbl.value 
	GROUP BY smf.ParentId,smf.TypeId,curr.Name, smf.ObhId,smf.FileId,smf.IsAdvCustomer,smf.IsAdvProvider

)
SELECT 
FORMAT((SELECT SUM(REV.AmountPartnert) FROM REV WHERE REV.loaiphi=1 AND (REV.obhid IS NULL and REV.parentid IS NULL)),'N02' ) AS REV, 
FORMAT((SELECT SUM(REV.AmountPartnert) FROM REV WHERE (REV.loaiphi=2 OR REV.loaiphi=3 OR REV.loaiphi=4) AND (REV.obhid IS NULL and REV.parentid IS NULL AND REV.advcus=0 AND REV.advpro=0 )),'N02') AS Cost, 
FORMAT((SELECT SUM(REV.AmountPartnert) FROM REV WHERE REV.loaiphi=1 AND (REV.obhid IS NULL and REV.parentid IS NULL)) 
	- (SELECT SUM(REV.AmountPartnert) FROM REV WHERE (REV.loaiphi=2 OR REV.loaiphi=3 OR REV.loaiphi=4) AND (REV.obhid IS NULL and REV.parentid IS NULL AND REV.advcus=0 AND REV.advpro=0)),'N02') AS BALANCE ,
 
ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBLNo,
ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shippertext, 
ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeDes,'') AS consigneetext, 
ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS NotyDes,
ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') AS Feedervessel,
ISNULL(POl.Name,'') AS POLName,
ISNULL(POD.Name,'') AS PODName,
ISNULL(destination.Name,'') AS Destination,
isnull(payableat.Name,'') as Payable,
isnull(sm.NumberOriginalIdText,'') AS numberbill,
ISNULL(sm.ShippingMark,'') AS SPMK,
ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DetailsGoodstext,
ISNULL( sm.ForDeliveryGoodsDes,'') AS Deliverygoods,
ISNULL(charge.Name,'') AS Chageterm,
ISNULL(place.Name,'') AS placeissue,
FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.IssueDate,''),'dd MMM, yy') AS dateissue,
ISNULL(receipt.Name,'') AS placereceipt,
ISNULL(deliveryplace.Name,'') AS deliveryplace ,
ISNULL(typemove.Name,'') AS Typeofmove,
ISNULL(caluse.Name,'') AS clause,
FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.SaillingDate,''),'dd MMM, yyyy') AS saillingdate,
ISNULL(sm.ContainerText,'') AS quantityofcontainer,
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unitpkg
FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = sm.PolId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.FinalDestinationId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData payableat ON payableat.Id = sm.FreightPayableId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData charge ON charge.Id = sm.FreightChargeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData place ON place.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON receipt.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal deliveryplace ON deliveryplace.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData typemove ON typemove.Id = sm.TypeMoveId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData caluse ON caluse.Id = sm.ClauseId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=sm.UnitId
WHERE   sm.Id='{Id}';
WITH GroupAmount AS 
(	SELECT SUM(ISNULL(CASE WHEN CurrSale.Code = 'USD' AND curr.Name<>'USD' THEN ROUND(smf.TotalAmount * smf.ExSaleUSD,2)
	WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'USD' AND curr.Name = 'USD' THEN ROUND(smf.TotalAmount,2) 
	WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'VND' AND curr.Name='VND' THEN smf.TotalAmount
	ELSE smf.TotalAmount*smf.ExchangeRateVND
	END,0)) AS AmountPartnert,
	smf.VendorId AS vendorid,
	smf.TypeId AS SubtotalObj
	FROM 
	dbo.ShipmentFee smf 
	LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment  sm1 ON sm1.Id=smf.FileId
	LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON smf.CurrencyId=curr.Name
	LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner pn ON pn.Id = smf.VendorId
	LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData CurrSale ON CurrSale.Id = '{CurrencyId}'
	LEFT JOIN STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ',')  split_hbl ON smf.ShipmentId = split_hbl.value 
    WHERE smf.FileId=sm1.Id  AND sm1.ID='{Id}'
	and smf.ShipmentId = split_hbl.value 
	GROUP BY smf.VendorId, smf.TypeId

)
SELECT  
sm.Id,
fee.IsFreight,
fee.IsLogistics,
fee.IsTrucking,
ISNULL(feename.Name,'') AS Feename,
ISNULL(fee.Quantity,'') AS Qty, 
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unit,
ISNULL(fee.Amount,'') AS Uniprice,
ISNULL(curr.Code,'') AS Curr,
FORMAT(ISNULL(fee.Quantity,0)* ISNULL(fee.Amount,0),'N2') AS Amount,
ISNULL(fee.InvoiceCode,'') AS VATCODE,
CASE WHEN (fee.ShipmentInvoiceCode IS NOT NULL) THEN fee.ShipmentInvoiceCode 
	WHEN inv.Code IS NOT NULL THEN inv.Code 
	ELSE '' END AS INV,
ISNULL(sales.FullName,'') AS salesM,
CASE WHEN ISNULL(pn.Name,'')='' THEN pn.FullName ELSE pn.Name END AS NamePartner,
feename.GroupName,

CASE WHEN ((fee.TypeId=1 OR fee.IsAdvCustomer=1 ) OR ( fee.TypeId=1 OR fee.IsAdvCustomer=1  AND (fee.ParentId IS NOT NULL OR  fee.ObhId IS NOT NULL))) THEN 'I. REVENUE' 
		WHEN ((fee.TypeId=2 OR fee.TypeId=3 OR fee.IsAdvProvider=1) AND (fee.ParentId IS NULL AND fee.ObhId IS NULL)) THEN 'II. COSTING' 
		WHEN ((fee.TypeId=2 OR fee.TypeId=3 ) AND (fee.ParentId IS NOT NULL or fee.ObhId IS NOT NULL)) then 'III. On Behaft'
		ELSE 'IV. Other' END AS OBJECTNAME,

FORMAT( CASE WHEN (fee.ObhId IS NULL AND fee.ParentId IS NULL AND fee.IsAdvCustomer =0  AND fee.IsAdvProvider =0 ) THEN 
ISNULL(CASE WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'USD' AND curr.Name<>'USD' THEN ROUND(fee.TotalAmount*ISNULL(fee.ExSaleUSD,0),2)
	WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'USD' AND curr.Name = 'USD' THEN ROUND(fee.TotalAmount,2) 
	WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'VND' AND curr.Name='VND' THEN fee.TotalAmount
	WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'VND' AND curr.Name<>'VND' THEN fee.TotalAmount * ISNULL(fee.ExSaleVND,0)
	ELSE fee.TotalAmount*ISNULL(fee.ExSaleVND,0)
	END,0) 
	ELSE 0 END  ,'N2')
	AS AMSales,

FORMAT(ISNULL(CASE WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'USD' AND curr.Name<>'USD'   THEN ROUND(fee.TotalAmount* ISNULL(fee.ExSaleUSD,0),2)
	WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'USD' AND curr.Name = 'USD'  THEN ROUND(fee.TotalAmount,2) 
	WHEN CurrSale.Code  = 'VND' AND curr.Name='VND'  THEN fee.TotalAmount
	ELSE ROUND(fee.TotalAmount*ISNULL(fee.ExSaleUSD,0),2)
	END,0),'N2') AS AmountChange,
	
fee.ExSaleUSD, fee.ExSaleVND, fee.Notes AS NOTES,
CASE WHEN fee.ParentId IS NOT NULL or fee.ObhId IS NOT NULL THEN 'OBH - ' ELSE '' END AS isOBH,
CurrSale.Code  AS SalesCurr,
FORMAT((SELECT SUM(AmountPartnert) FROM GroupAmount WHERE GroupAmount.vendorid=fee.VendorId AND (fee.ObhId IS NULL AND fee.ParentId IS NULL) ),'N02') AS  SubTotalPN,
FORMAT((SELECT SUM(AmountPartnert) FROM GroupAmount WHERE GroupAmount.SubtotalObj=fee.TypeId AND (fee.ObhId IS NULL AND fee.ParentId IS NULL) ),'N02') AS  SubObj
FROM dbo.ShipmentFee fee 
LEFT JOIN dbo.FeeType feename ON feename.Id=fee.DescriptionId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=fee.UnitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData curr ON fee.CurrencyId = curr.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.ShipmentInvoice inv ON fee.ShipmentInvoiceId = inv.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData CurrSale ON CurrSale.Id = '{CurrencyId}'
LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id = fee.FileId
LEFT JOIN dbo.[User] sales ON sales.id = SM.SaleId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner pn ON pn.Id = fee.VendorId
LEFT JOIN STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ',')  split_hbl ON fee.ShipmentId = split_hbl.value 

WHERE 

fee.FileId = sm.Id
and sm.id='{Id}'
and fee.ShipmentId = split_hbl.value 
AND ( ('{OptionPLIds}' like '%1%' and fee.IsFreight = 1 OR (fee.IsFreight=0 AND(fee.IsAdvCustomer=1 OR fee.IsAdvProvider=1) ))
		OR ('{OptionPLIds}' like '%2%' and fee.IsLogistics = 1 OR (fee.IsLogistics = 0 AND (fee.SettlementNo IS NOT NULL)))
		OR ('{OptionPLIds}' like '%3%' and fee.IsTrucking = 1)
		
	)

ORDER BY  OBJECTNAME,NamePartner,fee.[Order] ASC

Components.Label: ARRIVAL NOTICE
Components.Query:
WITH Sumcont AS (
    SELECT 
        SUM(ct1.PKG) AS PKG1,
		SUM(ct1.Weight) AS weight1,
		SUM(ct1.CBM) AS cbm1
		 
        
    FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct1
    LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm1 ON ct1.EntityId = sm1.Id
    WHERE sm1.Id = '{Id}'
    GROUP BY sm1.Id
),
Total AS 
(SELECT SUM( ROUND((ROUND(f.Amount * (CASE WHEN ISNULL(f.ExchangeRateINV,0)=0 THEN f.ExchangeRateVND ELSE f.ExchangeRateINV END),0))*f.Quantity,0) +
 ISNULL(ROUND(ROUND((ROUND(f.Amount * (CASE WHEN ISNULL(f.ExchangeRateINV,0)=0 THEN f.ExchangeRateVND ELSE f.ExchangeRateINV END),0))*f.Quantity,0)*(f.Vat/100),0),0)) AS sumt,
 f.HblNo
FROM dbo.ShipmentFee f
WHERE isan=1
GROUP BY f.HblNo
)

SELECT 
format((SELECT SUM(Total.sumt) FROM Total WHERE Total.HblNo=sm.HblNo ),'N02') AS SUM2 ,
ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBLNo,
ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shippertext,
LEFT(sm.ShipperDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ShipperDes) - 1) AS Shipperts,
sm.MblNo AS mbl,

ISNULL(customer.CompanyName,'') AS Customers,
FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.EtaDate,''),'dd/MM/yyyy') as ETA,
ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeDes,'') AS consigneetext, 
ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS NotyDes,
ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') AS Feedervessel,
sm.OceanVesselVoy,
ISNULL(sm.OceanVessel,'') AS VEssel,
ISNULL(POl.Name,'') AS POLName,
ISNULL(POD.Name,'') AS PODName,
ISNULL(destination.Name,'') AS Destination,
isnull(payableat.Name,'') as Payable,
isnull(sm.NumberOriginalIdText,'') AS numberbill,
ISNULL(sm.ShippingMark,'') AS SPMK,
ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DetailsGoodstext,
ISNULL( sm.ForDeliveryGoodsDes,'') AS Deliverygoods,
ISNULL(charge.Name,'') AS Chageterm,
ISNULL(place.Name,'') AS placeissue,

FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.IssueDate,''),'dd MMM, yy') AS dateissue,
ISNULL(receipt.Name,'') AS placereceipt,
ISNULL(deliveryplace.Name,'') AS deliveryplace ,
ISNULL(typemove.Name,'') AS Typeofmove,
ISNULL(caluse.Name,'') AS clause,
FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.SaillingDate,''),'dd MMM, yyyy') AS saillingdate,
ISNULL(sm.ContainerText,'') AS quantityofcontainer,
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unitpkg,
ISNULL(sm.DemFree,0) AS DEM,
FORMAT((SELECT PKG1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.PKG1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumpkg,
FORMAT((SELECT weight1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.weight1 IS NOT NULL ),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumweight,
FORMAT((SELECT cbm1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.cbm1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumcbm

FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = sm.PolId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner customer ON customer.Id = sm.CustomerId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData payableat ON payableat.Id = sm.FreightPayableId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData charge ON charge.Id = sm.FreightChargeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData place ON place.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId 
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON receipt.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal deliveryplace ON deliveryplace.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData typemove ON typemove.Id = sm.TypeMoveId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData caluse ON caluse.Id = sm.ClauseId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=sm.UnitId
WHERE   sm.Id='{Id}' 

SELECT 
ISNULL(contype.Name,'') AS consize,
ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS ContNo,
ISNULL(ct.SealNo,'') AS Seal,
format(ISNULL(ct.PKG,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS Qty,
ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unit,
format(ISNULL(ct.Weight,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS GW,
format(ISNULL(ct.CBM,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS CBM

FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON ct.EntityId=sm.Id
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData contype ON ct.ContainerTypeId = contype.Id 
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=ct.UnitId 
WHERE ct.EntityId=sm.Id AND sm.Id='{Id}'

SELECT SUM(ct.PKG) AS pkg3, SUM(ct.Weight) AS weight3 , SUM(ct.CBM) AS cbm3
FROM dbo.EntityContainer  ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment shipt ON ct.EntityId=shipt.Id
WHERE shipt.Id='{Id}' 


SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY fee.Id) AS stt,
namefee.Description AS desfee,
fee.Quantity AS Qty,
unit.Name AS unitn,
FORMAT(fee.Amount,'N02') AS Unitprice,
fee.CurrencyCode AS CURR,
FORMAT(CASE WHEN fee.CurrencyCode<>'VND' then
ROUND((fee.Amount * (CASE WHEN ISNULL(fee.ExchangeRateINV,0)=0 THEN fee.ExchangeRateVND ELSE fee.ExchangeRateINV END)),0) 
ELSE
fee.Amount END,'N02')
AS AmountVND,

FORMAT(CASE WHEN fee.CurrencyCode<>'VND' then
ROUND((ROUND(fee.Amount * (CASE WHEN ISNULL(fee.ExchangeRateINV,0)=0 THEN fee.ExchangeRateVND ELSE fee.ExchangeRateINV END),0))*fee.Quantity,0) 
ELSE 
fee.TotalAmount END ,'N02')
AS TotalAmountVND,
FORMAT(CASE WHEN fee.CurrencyCode<>'VND' AND fee.Tax IS NOT NULL then
ROUND(ROUND((ROUND(fee.Amount * (CASE WHEN ISNULL(fee.ExchangeRateINV,0)=0 THEN fee.ExchangeRateVND ELSE fee.ExchangeRateINV END),0))*fee.Quantity,0)*(fee.Vat/100),0)

ELSE ISNULL(fee.AmountTax,0)
end,'N02')
 AS TotalVAT,
FORMAT(ROUND((ROUND(fee.Amount * (CASE WHEN ISNULL(fee.ExchangeRateINV,0)=0 THEN fee.ExchangeRateVND ELSE fee.ExchangeRateINV END),0))*fee.Quantity,0) +
 ISNULL(ROUND(ROUND((ROUND(fee.Amount * (CASE WHEN ISNULL(fee.ExchangeRateINV,0)=0 THEN fee.ExchangeRateVND ELSE fee.ExchangeRateINV END),0))*fee.Quantity,0)*(fee.Vat/100),0),0)
,'N02') AS BFTAX,

ISNULL(fee.Vat,'') AS vat,
fee.TotalAmountTax,
fee.ExchangeRateVND,
fee.ExchangeRate,
fee.ExchangeRateINV,
fee.TotalAmount, fee.isan

FROM dbo.ShipmentFee fee 
LEFT JOIN dbo.FeeType namefee ON namefee.Id=fee.DescriptionId
LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=fee.UnitId
LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON sm.Id=fee.ShipmentId
WHERE 
fee.isan=1 AND
sm.Id='{Id}'

Components.Label: DELIVERY ORDER
Components.Query: WITH Sumcont AS ( SELECT SUM(ct1.PKG) AS PKG1, SUM(ct1.Weight) AS weight1, SUM(ct1.CBM) AS cbm1 FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct1 LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm1 ON ct1.EntityId = sm1.Id WHERE sm1.Id = '{Id}' GROUP BY sm1.Id ) SELECT ISNULL(sm.HblNo,'') AS HBLNo, ISNULL(sm.ShipperDes,'') AS shippertext, LEFT(sm.ShipperDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ShipperDes) - 1) AS Shipperts, LEFT(sm.ConsigneeDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes)- 1) AS Consigneename, SUBSTRING( sm.ConsigneeDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes) + 1, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes, CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes) + 1) - CHARINDEX(CHAR(10), sm.ConsigneeDes) - 1 ) AS ConsigneeAdd, sm.MblNo AS mbl, ISNULL(customer.CompanyName,'') AS Customers, FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.EtaDate,''),'dd/MM/yyyy') as ETA, ISNULL(sm.ConsigneeDes,'') AS consigneetext, ISNULL(sm.NotifyPartyDes,'') AS NotyDes, ISNULL(sm.Vessel,'') AS Feedervessel, sm.OceanVesselVoy, ISNULL(sm.OceanVessel,'') AS VEssel, ISNULL(POl.Name,'') AS POLName, ISNULL(POD.Name,'') AS PODName, ISNULL(destination.Name,'') AS Destination, isnull(payableat.Name,'') as Payable, isnull(sm.NumberOriginalIdText,'') AS numberbill, CASE WHEN sm.ShippingMark IS NOT NULL THEN ' Shipping Marks: ' + CHAR(10) + sm.ShippingMark ELSE '' END AS SPMK, ISNULL(sm.DetailsGoods,'') AS DetailsGoodstext, ISNULL( sm.ForDeliveryGoodsDes,'') AS Deliverygoods, ISNULL(charge.Name,'') AS Chageterm, ISNULL(place.Name,'') AS placeissue, FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.IssueDate,''),'dd MMM, yy') AS dateissue, ISNULL(receipt.Name,'') AS placereceipt, ISNULL(deliveryplace.Name,'') AS deliveryplace , ISNULL(typemove.Name,'') AS Typeofmove, ISNULL(caluse.Name,'') AS clause, FORMAT(ISNULL(sm.SaillingDate,''),'dd MMM, yyyy') AS saillingdate, ISNULL(sm.ContainerText,'') AS quantityofcontainer, ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unitpkg, ISNULL(sm.DemFree,0) AS DEM, FORMAT((SELECT PKG1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.PKG1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumpkg, FORMAT((SELECT weight1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.weight1 IS NOT NULL ),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumweight, FORMAT((SELECT cbm1 FROM Sumcont WHERE Sumcont.cbm1 IS NOT NULL),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS sumcbm FROM dbo.Shipment sm LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POL ON POL.Id = sm.PolId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal POD ON POD.Id = sm.PodId LEFT JOIN dbo.Partner customer ON customer.Id = sm.CustomerId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal destination ON destination.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData payableat ON payableat.Id = sm.FreightPayableId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData charge ON charge.Id = sm.FreightChargeId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData place ON place.Id = sm.PlaceIssueId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal receipt ON receipt.Id = sm.PlaceReceiptId LEFT JOIN dbo.Terminal deliveryplace ON deliveryplace.Id = sm.PlaceDeliveryId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData typemove ON typemove.Id = sm.TypeMoveId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData caluse ON caluse.Id = sm.ClauseId LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=sm.UnitId WHERE sm.Id='{Id}' SELECT ISNULL(contype.Name,'') AS consize, ISNULL(ct.ContainerNo,'') AS ContNo, ISNULL(ct.SealNo,'') AS Seal, format(ISNULL(ct.PKG,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS Qty, ISNULL(unit.Name,'') AS Unit, format(ISNULL(ct.Weight,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS GW, format(ISNULL(ct.CBM,''),'N{CTotalPrice}') AS CBM FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment sm ON ct.EntityId=sm.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData contype ON ct.ContainerTypeId = contype.Id LEFT JOIN dbo.MasterData unit ON unit.Id=ct.UnitId WHERE ct.EntityId=sm.Id AND sm.Id='{Id}' SELECT SUM(ct.PKG) AS pkg3, SUM(ct.Weight) AS weight3 , SUM(ct.CBM) AS cbm3 FROM dbo.EntityContainer ct LEFT JOIN dbo.Shipment shipt ON ct.EntityId=shipt.Id WHERE shipt.Id='{Id}'

GridPolicies.Query:
select *
from [ShipmentFee]
where ShipmentId = '{HblId}' and TypeId in ({TypeIds}) and (1 = {IsObh} or (0 = {IsObh} and ObhId is null)) and NoSubmit = 0
GridPolicies.PreQuery:
{
    "Id": this.Entity.Id,
    "HblId": this.Entity.HblId,
    "TypeIds": this.Entity.OptionIds ? this.Entity.OptionIds.split(',').map(id => `${id}`).join(',') : '-1',
    "IsObh": this.Entity.OptionIds && this.Entity.OptionIds.includes('5') ? 1 : 0,
    "IsAll": this.Entity.IsAll ? 1 : 0
}

GridPolicies.Label: Copy Costing
GridPolicies.Query:
select *
from [ShipmentFee]
where ShipmentId = '{HblId}' and TypeId in ({TypeIds}) and (1 = {IsObh} or (0 = {IsObh} and ObhId is null)) and NoSubmit = 0
GridPolicies.PreQuery:
{
    "Id": this.Entity.Id,
    "HblId": this.Entity.HblId,
    "TypeIds": this.Entity.OptionIds ? this.Entity.OptionIds.split(',').map(id => `${id}`).join(',') : '-1',
    "IsObh": this.Entity.OptionIds && this.Entity.OptionIds.includes('5') ? 1 : 0,
    "IsAll": this.Entity.IsAll ? 1 : 0
}

{
    "CustomerId": this.EditForm.ShipmentDetail.CustomerId,
    "PolId": this.EditForm.ShipmentDetail.PolId,
    "PodId": this.EditForm.ShipmentDetail.PodId,
    "VendorId": this.EditForm.Entity.VendorId,
    "ParentId": this.EditForm.ShipmentDetail.Id,
    "Id": this.EditForm.ShipmentDetail.Id,
    "TypeId": this.EditForm.ShipmentDetail.TypeId,
    "IsAll": this.Entity.IsAll ? 1 : 0
}
GridPolicies.OrderBy: CASE WHEN ds.ParentId = '{ParentId}' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, ds.EtdDate DESC, ds.EtaDate DESC

Components.Label: Hbl
Components.Query:
select *
from [Shipment]
where Id in ({HblIds})

select *
from [ShipmentFee]
where ShipmentId in ({HblIds}) and TypeId in ({TypeIds}) and (1 = {IsObh} or (0 = {IsObh} and ObhId is null)) and NoSubmit = 0

select *
from [EntityContainer]
where EntityId in ({HblIds})

Components.Label: Job
Components.Query:
select *
from [Shipment]
where Id in ('{Id}')

select *
from [Shipment]
where Id in ({HblIds})

select *
from [ShipmentFee]
where ShipmentId in ({HblIds}) and TypeId in ({TypeIds}) and (1 = {IsObh} or (0 = {IsObh} and ObhId is null)) and NoSubmit = 0

select *
from [EntityContainer]
where EntityId in ('{Id}')

select *
from [EntityContainer]
where EntityId in ({HblIds})

select *
from [EntityTransit]
where EntityId in ('{Id}')

select EntityContainer.*
from EntityContainer
left join Shipment on EntityContainer.EntityId = Shipment.Id
where Shipment.ParentId = '{ShipmentId}'
